parameterdescription.para: Position in the 64-byte array that buffers data to be written into EEPROM.

briefdescription.para: Write the part of the URL before the circular buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Length of the circular buffer in blocks. This is used to calculate the NDEF message length.
Pointer to the status field encoded in base 64.

briefdescription.para: Create a URL with a blank circular buffer.

detaileddescription.para:
qlenblks
Length of the circular buffer URL parameter (q) in blocks.
statusb64
Pointer to the status field encoded in base 64.
qstartblk
Pointer to an integer into which this function writes the start block of the q URL parameter.
ver
Version identifier.
1 if qlenblks is not even. The circular buffer is zero-padded with a base64 octet that decodes to 0,0,0,0,0,0.
